challenge.title: Starch Solution by John McDougall
challenge.description: John McDougall has written for a long time about how a whole food plant based diet reverses chronic diseases. In this video, he discusses his book "The Starch Solution" (2012) about how a vegan diet based on starches can fuel health.
challenge.instructions: Watch John McDougall's lecture on YouTube
